title: Grocery Shopping
description: Buy groceries for the week including vegetables, fruits, and dairy products.

title: Finish Project Report
description: Complete the final report for the XYZ project.

title: Gym Workout
description: Attend gym for a 1-hour workout focusing on cardio and strength training.

title: Call Parents
description: Give mom and dad a call to catch up.

title: Plan Weekend Trip
description: Research locations and book accommodation for the upcoming weekend getaway.

title: Doctor's Appointment
description: Attend the annual health check-up appointment.

title: Read a Book
description: Read 50 pages of the book on personal development.

title: Complete Code Review
description: Review code for the new app update and provide feedback.

title: Prepare Presentation
description: Create slides and prepare notes for the upcoming team presentation.

title: Pay Bills
description: Pay electricity, water, and internet bills before the due date.
